description: two vertical cliffs along L and R edges; red sun at upper center; lines of wispy clouds across cliffs; gnarled tree at lower center; small, robed human figure carrying staff stands with back to viewer
inscription:
昔賢能守節　千古感吾情　昨日入山去　未看薇蕨生 (The sages of the past were able to hold to virtue, / moving me from thousands of years in the past! / Yesterday I went into the mountains / but could not find any ferns there growing.) [Jonathan Chaves]

Poem: Seisho sanbō shū no. 195
markings: poem UR red seal: 無邪 {muja}; poem LL red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #7], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #7]
text:
昔賢能守節　
千古感吾情　
昨日入山去　
未首薇蕨生
The sages of the past were able to hold to virtue,
Moving me from thousands of years in the past!
Yesterday I went into the mountains
But could not find any ferns growing there.
title: Pine Tree and Rising Sun between Cliffs
